name: Dude against the Dunes
description:

How to play:

Use the first four Buttons to move.

Use the Buttons on the box to do actions.

"Days are hot
Nights are cold
Make a comment
I will up vote."

  • Its has 4 ways to lose:
    • Starving
    • Thirst
    • Cold
    • Heat

You can drink water and eat coconuts.

In the cave you can grab a lizard, in the campfire you can cook it while warm yourself and eat it.

When the time bar is depleted day turns to night, and vice versa. The lizards don't appear at night.

If you survive for 5 days, you win.

To catch a lizard you need to wait until his head poke out of the cave, and move to the cave, but if you wait in the cave location or there is another dead lizard near the campfire he won't leave the cave, so you won't be able to catch it.
